Comments_List:
I have developed some of the technical knowledge that is used to set up a camera when taking a picture. 
Also, we have learned the basics of photoshop and camera raw. However, the time was short to be able and advance on that. 
We also learned how to make our own prints, which was really helpful...
I was able to understand how to use a digital camera and how to use photoshop. Two invaluable skills for a digital photographer.
I believe that this course is good, however, it could've been better if it was more intensive, more hours of learning, more days a week and also more content that could be taught.
High level on engagement with students but lacks in clear instruction.

No. I believe that Yale has much to offer. However, this is an extremely expensive course to be provided only two classes a week and 3 hour each. Its very little time to improve something, to actually acknowledge the content that is being presented in class and there is a lot missing to it because everything has very short time to be seen.
Yes. I believe this is a course great for any student with an interest in digital photography.
